attributes.action: raise tax on road fuel to cut road miles, and reduce other taxes to compensate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road fuel taxes should be raised every year in order to reduce miles driven. This will reduce emission of greenhouse gases, traffic congestion and pollution. It will also conserve oil reserves. Other taxes should  be reduced or abolished so that people will be no worse off financially.
